articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Frustrating Imperialists' Reactionary Offensive
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Frustrating Imperialists' Reactionary Offensive
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Every country can protect its revolutionary gains and its sovereignty and the dignity of the nation only when it stands up against the imperialists' desperate counter-revolutionary offensive in a steadfast anti-imperialist spirit and with a revolutionary offensive based on the strong driving force. Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in an article. 
					It goes on:
					
					The present reality calls for intensifying the struggle to shatter the reactionary offensive of the imperialists.
					
					The basic barometer distinguishing the strong from the weak in the standoff with imperialists lies not in the superiority of arms and equipment but in the ideological and moral readiness of the army and people of a revolutionary country.
					
					Even though a country is backward in arms and equipment when compared with the enemy's, it can emerge strong when it is transparent in the anti-imperialist spirit. 
					
					Any country having resolute anti-imperialist spirit, it will never harbor any illusion and fear of imperialists. It can, at the same time, decisively shatter the imperialists' high-handed practices and moves for aggression.
					
					Only when a country remains strong can it bar the imperialists from daring provoke it and firmly defend its sovereignty and that of the nation.
					
					If a country fails to build a self-supporting national economy, it can hardly stand the imperialists' sanctions and blockade. Begging imperialists for something leads to subordination and self-destruction.
					
					The Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people are firmly defending the revolutionary gains and the sovereignty of the country and the nation, frustrating the imperialists' high-handed practices and moves for aggression because they have steadfast anti-imperialist spirit and a strong driving force.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work on Party Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work on Party Work Observed
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday dedicates a signed article to the 35th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work calling for radically improving the work of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to vigorously push forward the process of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea. 
					In the work Kim Jong Il gave perfect answers to all the theoretical and practical questions arising in the building of the party of President Kim Il Sung, including the essence and necessity of modeling the whole party on the Juche idea and tasks and ways to do so.
					
					The WPK is the revolutionary party which has achieved unbreakable unity and cohesion, guided by the President's idea, channeled every effort into realizing his intention and wishes and carried out its construction and activities the way he did, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					It is the true appearance of the WPK that all the party members think and act according to the President's idea and intention and advance along the only road indicated by the Juche idea, Songun idea. Today all the party members have turned out as one in the general offensive in hearty response to the militant call of the party for bringing about a new great revolutionary surge. This reality goes to prove what high level the WPK's unity in thought, purpose and action has reached.
					
					Under the wise guidance of the WPK the desire of the President to build a great prosperous and powerful nation is becoming a brilliant reality.
					
					It is the firm will of the WPK that in order to realize the intention and wishes of the President it is necessary to make a flower bloom even on a rock and pluck a star from the sky. Thanks to this will the DPRK is sure to turn into a thriving country in the near future.
					
					All the leading officials of the party help the popular masses solve problems arising in their living as a true mother would do and actively arouse their voluntary enthusiasm to forcefully advance the revolution and construction, strictly pursuant to the revolutionary mass line. It is the genuine work style prevailing throughout the party. Thanks to this the masses' trust in the party is getting deeper and the single-minded unity of the party and the revolutionary ranks is growing stronger as the days go by.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea and Lee's Resignation Demanded
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea and Lee's Resignation Demanded
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification in a statement on July 28 said that south Koreans would drive the U.S. forces out of their land as they have imposed a tragic fate upon the Korean nation. 
					More than half a century has passed since the Armistice Agreement was concluded on the Korean Peninsula, but the source of war still remains, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					The U.S. brought into south Korea huge aggressor forces and nuclear weapons in violation of the AA but it became so impudent as to kick up a racket against the DPRK, raising a hue and cry over its "nuclear issue."
					
					The north's access to nuclear weapons is a natural outcome of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK as the latter is talking about "dialogue" before public while going busy with ceaseless war exercises for invading the north and arms buildup behind the scene. 
					
					 The organization in a statement on July 29 called on the people across south Korea to turn out in a struggle to eliminate the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					
					 It appealed to all the people from all walks of life to struggle in solidarity and unity under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in a bid to force the Lee dictatorial regime and the "Grand National Party" to step down and achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the nation.

articles.title: Lee Group Accused of Blocking Inter-Korean Working Contacts
articles.content:
Lee Group Accused of Blocking Inter-Korean Working Contacts
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean academic, youth and students and peasants headquarters under the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration on July 29 issued a joint letter of protest to accuse the government authorities of blocking even inter-Korean contacts.
					Recalling that the "Ministry of Unification" recently disallowed working contacts with the north under the unreasonable pretexts that "present situation of inter-Korean relations should be considered" and "it is not sure about the safety of organizations of the south," the letter of protest said: This action was a reckless one against reunification as it amounted to negating and incriminating the activities of the reunification movement organizations. 
					
					The letter urged the Lee Myung Bak "government" to drop its policy of confrontation without delay and express its will for implementing the joint declaration and come out in practical actions for achieving reconciliation, cooperation and the great unity of the nation.
					
					The members of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference on the same day to condemn the group of traitors for their reckless actions against reunification. 
					
					Speakers there urged the ministry to immediately repeal the measures taken to block the inter-Korean contacts.

articles.title: Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held
articles.content:
Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting and film show took place in Germany and Guinea, and a lecture, film show and photo exhibition in Brazil between July 14 and 22 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle. 
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Germany referred to the fact that President Kim Il Sung wisely led the army and the people during the Korean war of aggression provoked by the U.S. imperialists, dealing telling blows at them. 
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry, Guinea, said that under the outstanding leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, a milestone of Korean reunification, and the October 4 declaration, a program for  implementing it, were adopted to open a rosy prospect for Korean reunification. 
					
					 The acting chairman of the Trade Union Centre of the Tourist and Hotel Workers Union of Brazil declared it would send full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle to achieve national reunification and foil the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Participants of the film shows watched Korean films showing the invincible might of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 A solidarity message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Germany.

articles.title: Solidarity with Korean People Voiced in Brazil
articles.content:
Solidarity with Korean People Voiced in Brazil
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The 2nd Congress of the Brazilian Center for Peace and Solidarity among Peoples was held in Rio de Janeiro between July 24 and 26.
					 Present there were representatives from organizations for peace against war of 17 countries including Cuba, Vietnam, Syria, Nepal, the United States and Mexico.
					
					 The final declaration and resolutions on agenda items adopted at the congress denounced the U.S. hypocrisy expressed in blocking nuclear programs of developing countries for peaceful purposes, while keeping its huge stockpile of nuclear weapons. They also assailed the U.S. for posing a threat to the DPRK.
					
					 A resolution on solidarity with the DPRK supported the Korean people's struggle for national reunification and demanded the immediate and complete withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					
					 It supported the measures taken by the DPRK to bolster up its defense capability to cope with the threat of foreign aggression and congratulated it on the 56th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Replacement of AA by Peace Accord Called for
articles.content:
Replacement of AA by Peace Accord Called for
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association Headquartered in Spain issued a statement on July 21 in demand of the replacement of the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA) with a peace accord. 
					 The statement held that the AA concluded in 1953 should be replaced by a lasting peace accord, which should call for the complete withdrawal of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces from south Korea and the reunification of Korea, divided for more than half a century. 
					
					 Ceaseless provocations of the U.S. imperialists have further increased the danger of war or military conflict and reduced the AA to a dead paper, the statement noted, accusing them of having wantonly violated the AA and the resolution of the 30th UN General Assembly. 
					
					 The statement urged the U.S. imperialists to disorganize the hypocritical "UN Command" in south Korea and the UNSC to retract its "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.

articles.title: Glorifying President Kim Il Sung's Feats Called for
articles.content:
Glorifying President Kim Il Sung's Feats Called for
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of Ecuador separately issued statements in response to the call of the preparatory committee of Philippines to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					The Socialist Party-Ample Front of Ecuador and the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador in a joint statement on July 22 recalled that brisk preparations are now under way worldwide to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the preparatory committee of Philippines called for significantly commemorating this day internationally.
					
					 It called upon the provinces of Ecuador to form their preparatory committees and organize colorful events to highly praise the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung who turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist nation and his immortal feats and briskly conduct a solidarity movement in support of the Korean people's struggle. 
					
					 The Guaranda City Institute of Ecuador for Friendship, Culture and Solidarity with the Korean People in a statement on July 16 noted it is a duty of the progressive people to pay tribute to the commanders of Mt. Paektu of Korea who developed the DPRK into a fortress of socialism and beacon of hope. It declared the institute would help its citizens always remember the immortal feats the President performed for humankind and organize colorful events to this end.
